meta.desc: Load custom style sheet from ~/.config/gnome-shell/gnome-shell.css. Use GTK font family and font size from GNOME Tweaks in GNOME Shell.
meta.desc_long: Load custom style sheet from ~/.config/gnome-shell/gnome-shell.css. Use GTK font family and font size from GNOME Tweaks in GNOME Shell.
